onyomiExamples.meaning: snow's surface, lily-white skin, fair skin

kunyomiExamples.meaning: skin, body (in the context of intimate bodily contact), surface, grain (e.g. of wood), texture, disposition, temperament, character, type

texture, grain, one's skin (lacking makeup, etc.), natural skin, bare skin, scalp, surface of the earth, bare ground, surface of a sword blade
